data.lyric:
[ti:带我回家（Thunder to the Ground） (《妈妈咪鸭》电影主题曲)]
[ar:周笔畅]
[al:带我回家（Thunder to the Ground）]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]带我回家（Thunder to the Ground） - 周笔畅 (BiBi Zhou)
[00:01.14]词：Christopher Braide/Donna Missal
[00:02.28]曲：Christopher Braide/Donna Missal
[00:03.42]制作人：黎偌天
[00:04.57]编曲：黎偌天
[00:05.71]吉他：劳国贤
[00:06.85]和音：鱼椒盐/王馨悦
[00:08.00]弦乐：国际首席爱乐乐团 International Master Philharmonic Orchestra
[00:09.14]录音：杨祎
[00:10.28]混音：王晨雨
[00:11.43]发行：索雅音乐版权代理（北京）有限公司Sony/ATV Music Publishing China
[00:12.57]This broken arrow hangs over my head
[00:20.47]
[00:22.12]Hold steady oh hold steady
[00:26.92]
[00:32.07]We soldier on down to the last drum
[00:39.88]
[00:41.95]Keep your eyes on me when they're closing in
[00:45.87]
[00:46.95]We begin again I know we'll make it out
[00:51.31]
[00:51.91]With a stronger heart and the will to live
[00:55.90]
[00:56.85]We begin again we begin again
[01:01.69]When the lines ahead and we've come so far
[01:05.88]
[01:06.45]Hold onto my hand like thunder to the ground
[01:11.58]We light the dark with a roaring sound
[01:15.68]
[01:16.44]It's who we are thunder to the ground
[01:21.86]
[01:30.81]These eyes seen war I held my own
[01:39.17]
[01:40.52]And now I know we're stronger
[01:44.47]When we're not alone
[01:48.42]
[01:50.27]We light the fire burns through the night
[01:58.04]
[01:59.90]And I'm not afraid this time
[02:04.32]
[02:05.44]Keep your eyes on me when they're closing in
[02:09.09]
[02:09.98]We begin again I know we'll make it out
[02:14.34]
[02:14.97]With a stronger heart and the will to live
[02:18.88]
[02:19.88]We begin again we begin again
[02:24.40]When the lines ahead and we've come so far
[02:28.66]
[02:29.40]Hold onto my hand like thunder to the ground
[02:34.13]We light the dark with a roaring sound
[02:38.36]
[02:39.01]It's who we are thunder to the ground
[02:47.10]
[02:51.04]Like thunder to the ground
[02:58.67]
[03:03.27]Keep your eyes on me when they're closing in
[03:06.58]
[03:07.75]We begin again I know we'll make it out
[03:12.51]With a stronger heart and the will to live
[03:16.36]
[03:17.40]We begin again we begin again
[03:21.12]
[03:22.31]When the lines ahead and we've come so far
[03:26.47]
[03:27.08]Hold onto my hand like thunder to the ground
[03:31.82]We light the dark with a roaring sound
[03:36.06]
[03:36.63]It's who we are thunder to the ground
